server/src/symbols/symbolTable.ts.description: Scope class now has getSymbol() and hasSymbol() methods with parent chain traversal. These implement variable shadowing - inner scope symbols take precedence over outer scope symbols. Both methods use normalizeIdentifier() for case-insensitive lookup.

server/src/definition/definitionProvider.description: DefinitionProvider.getDefinition() now uses getSymbolAtOffset(word, wordInfo.start) for position-aware symbol lookup. The offset parameter comes from wordInfo.start which is the start position of the word being looked up.
